original_item.body:
Hi Mark,

Hope you're well! Alex has been performing excellently and has integrated well with our international team.

Due to our rapid expansion success, we need another AI Developer to join our international team. The role is similar to Alex's position:

- Mid-level AI Developer (2-4 years experience)
- Computer vision and deep learning focus
- Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch proficiency
- Natural language processing skills (new requirement)
- Budget: $75-85K annually
- Start date: September 15th, 2024
- Project: Multi-language sentiment analysis for international markets

Can you help us find another strong candidate? We're looking to move quickly on this.

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
CTO, SolarisProAi
original_item.subject: Urgent: Additional AI Developer Required

analysis.suggested_action: Start sourcing Mid-level AI Developer (CV + DL + NLP) immediately; send first shortlist within 48 hours and schedule a 30-min kickoff call.
analysis.relevance: Client needs a mid-level AI developer urgently to start Sept 15; immediate placement opportunity.
analysis.suggested_reply:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks â€” we can help and will start the search immediately for a Mid-level AI Developer with strong computer-vision, deep-learning, Python (TensorFlow/PyTorch) and multilingual NLP experience. To align sourcing: can you confirm any must-have languages, preferred timezone overlap, and whether the role is remote or hybrid?

We will compile an initial shortlist and send profiles within 48 hours and are available for a 30-minute kickoff call to finalize screening criteria. Please share a few times that work for you.

Best regards,
Mark
Partnerships, Digital Excellence
